name: Find & Replace
description:
I couldn't find a plugin that let me find and replace text using regular expressions, so I threw this together. Maybe you'll find it handy, too.


How to Use:

  • Select some text nodes. Otherwise, it'll just go find all the text nodes on the current page
  • Toggle case sensitive and / or regular expression matching (if you please)
  • Mash the big blue button


Please send me any bugs or feature requests.


Enjoy :)
